entry.title: Beijing Simulates Attack on Taiwan as Chinese Exercises Extend Into Third Day
entry.content: Chinese military aircraft and ships crossed the halfway mark of the Taiwan Strait, in a simulated land strike on the self-governing island that Beijing claims as its own.

entry.title: Moscow's Invasion Pushes Ukrainians to Ditch Russian, Learn Ukrainian
entry.content: Ukraine’s official tongue, once derided as the language of uneducated villagers, is gaining popularity in Kyiv and other cities where residents who grew up speaking Russian now want to sever linguistic ties.

entry.title: First Convoy of Ships Carrying Ukrainian Grain Leaves Odessa Under New Deal
entry.content: The convoy is carrying nearly 60,000 tons of corn and is a sign that last month’s agreement with Russia on facilitating Ukrainian food exports is holding.
